title: KSI responds to Justin Bieber comments about Logan Paul rematch: ‘**** you Justin!’
text:
KSI has responded to Justin Bieber over his comments about the upcoming professional boxing match between the Brit YouTube star and Logan Paul.

Yes, you read that right. KSI has responded to Bieber.

The Canadian pop star and maker of hit song ‘Baby’ is a friend of Paul’s and will be supporting him in the rematch on 9 November.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Paul was doing a bit of self-promotion ahead of the fight, only for Bieber to chime in on the comments section.

“Rip his head off,” Bieber commented.

And now, KSI has responded to him – and he hopes he is ringside for the bout too.
description: KSI has responded to Justin Bieber over his comments about the upcoming professional boxing match between the Brit YouTube star and Logan Paul. Yes, you read that right. KSI has responded to Bieber. The Canadian pop star and maker of hit song ‘Baby’ is a friend of Paul’s and will be supporting him in the rematch on 9 November.
